GSD.description:
cifs: fix potential deadlock in direct reclaim

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit dfa95e7ffdb415b061bef6e29e687b21e26f1c34. For more details please see the references link.
